# CapturedRoom.Section.Label

**Enumeration**

Textual names for one part of a larger structure.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Label
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Section] structure [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom/Section/label-swift.property] property is of this type.

## Assigning a section a label

- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.livingRoom**: A distinct area that resembles a living room within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.kitchen**: A distinct area that resembles a kitchen within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.diningRoom**: A distinct area that resembles a dining room within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.bedroom**: A distinct area that resembles a bedroom within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.bathroom**: A distinct area that resembles a bathroom within a larger structure.
- **CapturedRoom.Section.Label.unidentified**: An uncategorized area within a larger structure.

## Describing a section

- **label**: A textual name for the section.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
